Key Match Events: Myles Turner had season highs with 30 points and 11 rebounds
Tyrese Haliburton had a season-best 25 points and 12 assists
Dallas cut a 10-point deficit to five with 1:47 left
Haliburton hit a pull-up 17-footer with 50 seconds left
Andrew Nembhard put Indiana back ahead with a finger-roll basket
Dallas' next four possessions were 3-point misses
